cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on October 19, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4369, National Centers of Excellence in Advanced and Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 118 (Tuesday, July 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PALLONE:
H.R. 4369.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: [The Congress shall
have Power] To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[Page H3611]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

title: National Centers of Excellence in Advanced and Continuous Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Act of 2021
